part_description: Consists of a main rectangular body and a protruding lever at the bottom center. The body is smooth and compact, with rounded edges.
internal_interaction_description: The internal mechanism likely involves a pump system activated by the lever. Pressing the lever compresses an internal spring or pushes a piston, drawing liquid from a reservoir and dispensing it through the bottom opening.
external_interaction_description: Designed to be mounted on walls, it interacts with users who press the lever to dispense liquid soap or sanitizer. It can be refilled through a top opening, interacting with maintenance personnel during refill or cleaning.
